name: Highschool
description:
Bullying trigger warning!

Highschool is a hard time for many people, and words have a lot of impact.  Saving a life can be as simple as breaking  it, and right now it's up to you.

Help the student go through high school safely by creating chalk lines with your left mouse button, to block or cross out the bullying and let the friendship in.

The game was made in unity, it took the three of us about 3.5 hours to make it work. Tried hard to be on time but we missed a bit there.

Team members:
Art - https://itch.io/profile/kristinksn & https://itch.io/profile/makritza
Code - https://itch.io/profile/evilcookiz

Premade assets:
Music - https://mixkit.co/free-stock-music/ & https://freesound.org/people/loudernoises/sounds/332806/
